item.title: Banana Bread Cake
item.description: This moist and flavorful banana bread cake is perfect for breakfast or as a sweet treat. With the rich taste of ripe bananas and a hint of vanilla, it's sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_003
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 3 ripe bananas, mashed
  • 1/3 cup melted butter
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • Pinch of salt
  • 3/4 cup sugar
  • 1 large egg, beaten
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 cup all-purpose flour

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
  2. In a mixing bowl, mix the melted butter with the mashed bananas.
  3. Stir in the baking soda and salt.
  4. Add the sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract, and mix well.
  5. Finally, mix in the flour until just incorporated.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
